title: Online Video-Based Personalized Statistical Analysis Strategies for Highly Skilled Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and understanding of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: Optimized video content design for smartphone-based learning with parallel real-time Q&A sessions

learning_goals: Learners can interpret statistical analysis results with 90% accuracy and apply them to research reports
Learners can explain complex statistical concepts through logical flows of three or more steps
Learners can select appropriate analytical methods for their research topics with over 80% relevance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
